sorular.soru: In which situation are you allowed to keep driving like this?

feedback.metin: Only in the upper right and bottom left situations you are driving in the correct lane. In the upper two situations the rush-hour lane is open and you should use it if possible, as you should keep to the right as much as possible. In the bottom two situations, the rush-hour lane is closed and you are not allowed to use the hard shoulder. In that case, only two lanes on the left are available and you should keep to the right lane of these two as much as possible.

sorular.soru: Which sign warns of an accident?

feedback.metin: Sign J-34 warns of an accident. These signs are usually displayed on electronic matrix signs above or next to the road. Sign J-33 warns of an increased risk of traffic jams. This sign is also often displayed on electronic matrix signs, but can also be placed as a fixed sign at known bottlenecks. Sign J-39 warns of a movable obstacle that rises from the road surface, also known as a bollard.
